- Real-time stock price monitoring with dual data sources (Yahoo Finance API & web scraping)

- Comprehensive error handling and retry logic
- Detailed logging to file and console

- src/email_notifier.py: SMTP email alert system
- src/main.py: Main application with scheduler
- config/stocks.json: Stock symbols and threshold configuration
